meanings.definition: A large flightless bird native to South America, similar to an ostrich.
meanings.sent1: The nandu ran swiftly across the grassy plains.
meanings.sent2: I saw a nandu at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The nandu tried to dance but its long legs got tangled up!
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her like the graceful stride of a nandu.
meanings.sent5: The nandu's feathers shimmered in the sunlight, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The meat of the nandu bird, often consumed as food.
meanings.sent1: Tonight we are having a delicious stew made with nandu meat.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a special dish featuring nandu.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the nandu meat on the floor, what a mess!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the cooking nandu filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the nandu meat with care, ensuring it was tender and flavorful.
